mapper.select: SELECT count(*) cnt FROM cheaterdb WHERE ${param1} LIKE '%${param2}%'
SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum num, N.* FROM( SELECT * FROM cheaterdb WHERE ${param2} LIKE '%${param3}%' ORDER BY regdate DESC ) N ) WHERE num BETWEEN 1 + (${param1}-1)*5 AND 5 + (${param1}-1)*5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cheaterdb( bankname, cheatername, account, deposit, depositdate, phone, sex, feature, domain, goodskind, goodsname, cheaterid, link, regdate, content, cheatno, memberno ) VALUES( #{bankname}, #{cheatername}, #{account}, #{deposit}, #{depositdate}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{feature}, #{domain}, #{goodskind}, #{goodsname}, #{cheaterid}, #{link}, SYSDATE(), #{content}, #{cheatno}, #{memberno} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cheaterdb SET bankname = #{bankname}, cheatername = #{cheatername}, account = #{account}, deposit = #{deposit}, depositdate = #{depositdate}, phone = #{phone}, sex = #{sex}, feature = #{feature}, domain = #{domain}, goodskind = #{goodskind}, goodsname = #{goodsname}, cheaterid = #{cheaterid}, link = #{link}, content = #{content}, cheatno = #{cheatno} WHERE stateno = #{stateno}
